detail_desc: Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Mesh inner shorts.
Shorts in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, pleats at the top, a detachable tie belt, and lace trims at the hems.
Moisturising lip balm in a pot shaped like a unicorn. Strawberry flavour. 3 g. Not for children under 3 years of age.
Round sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Trousers in soft cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and hook-and-eye fasteners. Belt with D-rings, side pockets, back pockets and skinny legs.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.

Short, fitted dress in cotton twill with buttons down the front and a V-neck with a concealed press-stud at the top. Adjustable shoulder straps with large plastic buckles, side pockets with a decorative flap, and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Sandals in matt imitation leather. Adjustable foot straps with metal buckles and fluted soles.
Boxy top in soft velour with low dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Slightly wider, ribbed neckline.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Coat in soft pile with a collar, press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
A pair of metal hoop earrings decorated with plastic beads and cloud-shaped pendants with colourful glass rhinestones. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline, seam centre back and short, raw-edged sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
High-waisted shorts in woven fabric with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets and back pockets.
Smocked skirt in a viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication, and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Top in an airy cotton weave with frill trims, narrow tie-tip shoulder straps and a small V-neck with an opening and ties at the front. Lined.
Ballet pumps with a heart-shaped metal decoration. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Ankle-length yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wide panel at the top to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.

Non-wired, V-neck body in lace with cap sleeves and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck, a lined gusset with concealed press-studs and cutaway coverage at the back.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and zip down the front. Welt side pockets, stretch ribbed panels at the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slim Fit.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Calf-length dress in lace with short, scalloped cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with pleats at the top. Partly lined in a contrasting colour.
Ankle boots with pile linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and medium coverage at the back.
Lightly padded, quilted jacket with press-studs down the front and diagonal side pockets. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a wrapover front and high waist with ties at one side. Unlined.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.

Set in soft organic cotton. Dungaree dress in sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and adjustable press-stud fastenings at the front. Soft brushed inside. Long-sleeved bodysuit in patterned jersey with a decorative picot trim around the neckline and cuffs, and press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details. Extra-high waist, a button fly and gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel that is elasticated at the top to provide space for the tummy.
Thin metal chain necklace with a pineapple-shaped pendant decorated with glass rhinestones. Adjustable length. The zinc content of the necklace is recycled.
Long nightshirt in a patterned weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front, a chest pocket, long sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Straight-cut style with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Hobo bag in grained imitation leather with a detachable adjustable shoulder strap, zip at the top and an three inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 16x30x36 cm.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in viscose jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Moisturising lip balm with a watermelon flavour. 4 g.
Straight-cut blouse in a softly draping weave with a high, gently draped collar, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long sleeves and narrow cuffs with covered buttons.
Shirt in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Boxy-style top in jersey with short, wide sleeves and an elasticated, drawstring hem.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a round neckline, press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and text print on the front.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend.
Glittery cardigan in soft pile with long sleeves and no fasteners. Jersey lining.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Fully lined swimsuit in fast-drying functional fabric. Narrow cut at the top with a zip at the front and mesh details at the sides.
Scarf in patterned satin. Size 80x80 cm.
Narrow, metal-chain waist belt decorated with plastic beads. Adjustable length. Small carabiner hook at one end.
Long-sleeved nightshirt in a soft cotton weave with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and a rounded hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Double-layered hat in soft, rib-knit cotton jersey with a small appliqué on the front.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and a straight hem.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Shirt in a cotton herringbone weave with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft slub-knit viscose blend with a lace trim at the hem and slits in the sides.
Gently flared blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Round neckline with gathers for volume, a concealed zip at the back and short, raglan puff sleeves. Cotton lining.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an appliqué and print motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a gently rounded hem.
Top in cotton jersey with a motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Slightly rounded hem.
Set with a rib-knit hat and a scarf in woven fabric with a lightly brushed finish and fringes along the short sides.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a round neckline with narrow ribbing.
Trousers in a viscose and linen weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, side pockets and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved blouse in a viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a flounce at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Chinos in a stretch cotton weave with wide ribbing at the waist, a fake fly, fake side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Fine-knit polo shirt in a silk and cotton blend with a button placket and ribbing at the collar, cuffs and hem.
Hairbands in an airy weave. Can be worn around the head or a ponytail.

Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the hoodie is recycled.
Strapless, non-wired bandeau bra in cotton jersey with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Side support with decorative gathers. No fasteners.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets and straight legs with creases.
Sleeveless, fitted one-shoulder top in jersey with a sheen. Lined at the top.
Vest tops in stretch cotton jersey. Regular Fit.
Jumper in a textured cotton knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
